did.unittitle: Brooklyn and New York City musical performance scrapbook
did.abstract: This scrapbook contains programs, flyers, and newspaper clippings pertaining to musical recitals and operas in New York and Brooklyn for the 1923 to 1924 season. The compiler of the scrapbook is unknown.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single volume.
